item.title: Welcome to my new website
item.description: Hello from my new webpage! I am migrating from my wix website. My previous webpage was rather slow and resource intensive and most of all updating anything required quite a bit of effort on my part. This website is built with Hugo and is a pleasure to make, so I am confident that I can stay on schedule with updating this one. Shoutout to the creator of the theme - George Cushen.
